snippet.title: Wild Bastards - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
snippet.description:
The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy. Wishlist Wild Bastards now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest
